00021             inline void narrow(const std::wstring& src, std::string& dst)
00022             {
00023                 std::locale loc1;
00024                 dst.resize(src.length());
00025                 std::use_facet<std::ctype<wchar_t> > ( loc1 ).narrow(&src[0], &src[0] + src.length(), '?', &dst[0]);
00026             }
00029             inline void narrow(const std::string& src, std::string& dst)
00030             {
00031                 dst = src;
00032             }
00033         
00035             inline std::string narrow(const std::wstring& src)
00036             {
00037                 std::string ret_val;
00038                 narrow(src, ret_val);
00039                 return ret_val;
00040             }
00042             inline std::string narrow(const std::string& src)
00043             {
00044                 return src;
00045             }

00048             inline void widen(const std::wstring& src, std::wstring& dst)
00049             {
00050                 dst = src;
00051             }
00052 
00054             inline void widen(const std::string& src, std::wstring& dst)
00055             {
00056                 std::locale loc1;
00057                 dst.resize(src.length());
00058                 std::use_facet<std::ctype<wchar_t> > ( loc1 ).widen(&src[0], &src[0] + src.length(), &dst[0]);
00059             }
00060         
00062             inline std::wstring widen(const std::string& src)
00063             {
00064                 std::wstring ret_val;
00065                 widen(src, ret_val);
00066                 return ret_val;
00067             }

00070             template <class T>
00071             std::basic_string<T> singleCR(const std::basic_string<T>& str)
00072             {
00073                 const T CR('\n');
00074                 std::basic_string<T> res(str);
00075         
00076                 // remove any CR at end of string (may be multiple) 
00077                 while (!res.empty() && *res.rbegin() == CR)
00078                 {
00079                     res.erase(res.size()-1);
00080                 }
00081         
00082                 // append single CR
00083                 res.append(1,CR);
00084         
00085                 return res;
00086             }

00089             template <class T>
00090             inline T& tolower(T& str) 
00091             {
00092                 std::transform(str.begin(),str.end(),str.begin(),::tolower); 
00093                 return str; 
00094             }
00095         
00097             template <class T>
00098             inline T lower(const T& str) 
00099             {
00100                 std::string l(str);
00101                 std::transform(l.begin(),l.end(),l.begin(),::tolower); 
00102                 return l; 
00103             }
00104         
00106             template <class T>
00107             inline T& toupper(T& str) 
00108             { 
00109                 std::transform(str.begin(),str.end(),str.begin(),::toupper); 
00110                 return str; 
00111             }
00112         
00114             template <class T>
00115             inline T upper(const T& str) 
00116             {
00117                 std::string l(str);
00118                 std::transform(l.begin(),l.end(),l.begin(),::toupper); 
00119                 return l; 
00120             }
00121         
00123             template <class T>
00124             inline bool noCaseCompare(const T& s1, const T& s2) 
00125             {
00126                 return upper(s1) == upper(s2);
00127             }

00130             /*  @param val value to convert
00131                 @param precision number of decimals for floating point number.
00132                        Default value for string stream is used if this is not specified.
00133                       (unless \a flags is general, in which case it is the number of digits)
00134                 @param flags standard c++ format flags passed to a stringstream.
00135                 @deprecated use toString(...)
00136             */
00137             template<class T> 
00138             inline std::string 
00139             num2str(T val, int precision = -1, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags = std::ios_base::fixed)
00140             {
00141                 std::stringstream s;
00142                 s.setf(flags);
00143                 s.precision(precision);
00144                 s << val;
00145                 return s.str(); 
00146             }
00147         
00153             template<class CharType> 
00154             inline std::basic_string<CharType>
00155             replaceChars(const std::basic_string<CharType>& chars_to_replace, 
00156                          const std::basic_string<CharType>& replace_with_string, 
00157                          const std::basic_string<CharType>& src)
00158             {
00159                 std::basic_string<CharType> result;
00160                 typename std::basic_string<CharType>::const_iterator it;
00161                 for (it=src.begin(); it!=src.end(); ++it)
00162                 {
00163                     if (chars_to_replace.find(*it)!=std::basic_string<CharType>::npos)
00164                         result.append(replace_with_string);
00165                     else
00166                         result.push_back(*it);
00167                 }
00168                 return result;
00169             }
00171         }
00172     }
